item.description: Dec 16th will be our last Double Shot Karaoke Night. If you bring a new unwrapped child's toy to the Rosebud and donate it to our collection box, you will be able to sing TWO songs back to back for the remainder of the night. That's right Double Shot Karaoke.If you are not a singer, and bring a toy, you can designate your double shot to another singer of your choice, providing they had not donated a new unwrapped toy, for our Toy Drive. We will also have the Patriots and San Francisco Game Playing across the TV at the Rosebud. Come on down......
item.name: Double Shot Karaoke & Toys for Tots Toy Drive
